snippet.title: Nantucket - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Chase after Moby Dick, and live through the Golden Age of American whaling in this seafaring strategy game. Set sail around the world, and live Ishmael's story, the sole survivor of the Pequod, a few years after the events narrated by Herman Melville in his masterpiece.

Coming on PC on January 18th 2018.
http://www.picaresquestudio.com/nantucketgame

The game is available to add to your Steam wish list now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/621220

FULL TRAILER CREDITS

DIRECTOR: 
   Alfredo Buonanno
ASSISTANT DIRECTOR:
   Lucio Merola
DIRECTOR OF PHOTOGRAPHY:
   Girolamo Di Geronimo
PRODUCTION DESIGNER:
   Martina Picciola
ASSISTANT PRODUCTION DESIGNER:
   Roberto Liguori
SONG:
   The Maid of Amsterdam
       performed by
   The Roaring Trowmen https://roaringtrowmen.co.uk/
VOICE ACTORS:
   Pete Christensen
   Kyle Donelan
MAKE UP ARTIST:
   Elena Crocco
PHOTOGRAPHER:
   Maria Grazia Passariello
ACTORS (in order of appearence): 
   Rosario Copioso, Danilo Sibillo, Nunzio Esposito, Pietro Tufaro, Alessandro de Turris, Benedetto Marino, Francesco Altiero, Antonio Amoriello, Dario Pietrangioli, Vincenzo Giaquinto, Vincenzo Marino, Daniele Delle Femine, Ivan Ciavarella, Salvatore D'Esposito, Francesco Romano, Daniele Monaco, Antonio Imbelloni, Claudio Troili, Alessandra Salvetti, Valentina Del Prete
